Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Gugo46
Reviews.Content: Good quality product, auto fuse reset on turning off/on.  4 stars because might not have enough power output for 8 IR-illuminated cameras (as I have), needed to cycle the unit a couple of times initially to get all IR's to activate.  In general, pretty good, will use again and recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: DEFECTIVE!
Reviews.Author: garymds
Reviews.Content: Defective unit from the start---I waited too long to try and install it and missed the return window by a week.UPDATE:  Did some continuity checking, and it turns out that this power supply fried my 5 cameras.  The only saving grace is that I had not wired in my 6th camera at the time I hooked it up.

Reviews.Title: Does the job.
Reviews.Author: fred_de_bouch
Reviews.Content: Does the job as it should for a very decent price. Makes any multi camera install a must. Using a single socket in my UPS is a good thing too.

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: Selby P
Reviews.Content: The power supply works great, but the issue I had was with the locations for the access holes for the cables. With the access holes on the top, it makes the installation a bit less tidy that I would like. Also the pig tails came up a bit short to reach some of the Siamese cables that went to the cameras and the DVR. It would have been much better if the holes were on the bottom. It would be really nice also if there was a power switch.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: James E. Reid
Reviews.Content: I have used this product more than one time. I have had no issues with this power supply. Just hook up your cameras and plug in. Easy as pie.

Reviews.Title: Junction box.
Reviews.Author: busmantc2000
Reviews.Content: Instead of having wires and connections hooked up and looking like a birds nest it is a lot better to make it nice and neat to have an organized setup.

Reviews.Title: Awsome
Reviews.Author: Newton G. Grayson "NGG"
Reviews.Content: I had no regrets buying this product. for the price it well worth... I would recommend this to any person doing video surveillance

Reviews.Title: Kinda over complicated and not thought out, but it works.
Reviews.Author: Jesse
Reviews.Content: The thing works as described, I installed it with an 8 camera system with no issues. but if you look at the design it's kinda stupid.The door locks, but the power cable can be easily disconnected from the outside.There's a circuit board inside to screw all the power runs to the cameras, and each one has an LED light and some other junk that suggest they are separate channels. reality is. there is o fuse to separate the channels, so if one is on, they are all on. basically its just 10 green lights drawing power inside a closed box. sweet.

Reviews.Title: William s.
Reviews.Author: William L. Sunday "collector"
Reviews.Content: here were no suprises from item delivered and what was displayed.  It meets the basic requirementsI needed for this type of security system.  the locking feature is just the deterent i need as thebox will be exposed to family members both young and old.  I am content with my decision to buy.

Reviews.Title: Power Panel
Reviews.Author: Joey
Reviews.Content: As a professional CCTV Installer, this power panel works GREAT! The only drawback is that the terminals to connect the + and - ends are a bit tricky to get mounted versus a screw plate. aside from that, this power panel works exactly as described.

Reviews.Title: Easy Setup
Reviews.Author: RyanP
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for a small business.  With limited electrical knowledge and no previous experience with CCTV systems, I was able to add several new cameras to our system.  Our old power distributor box was maxed out, so this fit the bill perfectly.  I've been using it for about a month and there have been no problems.

Reviews.Title: Pretty much Useless
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: This unit produces 12 VDC power but it is so poorly filtered that the camera video is noise filled and unusable. You get what you pay for. Ordered an Altronix unit which is much more expensive but provides quality power. This one's going in the trash.
